settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Buildable design with approximately 21 blocks per figure
  • 14 movable joints for dynamic posing
  • Collector-friendly size (50x95mm) with display stand included
  • Genuine License Limited Edition
  • Diverse character selection including Ultraman Trigger, Tiga, Z, and villains
  • Interchangeable weapons and special effect parts
  • Premium materials with detailed paint applications

New Generation Legend features buildable figures from the latest Ultraman series. Focused on Ultraman Trigger and the 2022 TV show, each figure has 21 blocks and 14 articulation points for dynamic posing.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Ultraman Blokees Figures (may have one special figure)

  • Ultraman Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 9

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

settings.block_text: Features Ultra heavyweights: Zett Delta Rise Claw, dual-form Cosmos (Luna/Corona), Mebius, Orb Origin, Ribut, Regulos, alongside Absolute Diavolo and classic Zetton.
Build your heroes with about 21 precision blocks and create signature moves with 14 points of articulation. Easy-to-assemble design brings the fun of construction and dynamic posing together.
Dual-molded ABS parts with transparent effects, premium paint applications, and screen-accurate details.

Featuring iconic weapons like Belial Twilight and Orb Caliber, plus premium display stands for dynamic poses. Easy-snap accessories and smart storage design keep your collection ready for action and display.
Limited edition packaging, a display stand, and the thrill of the chase for a 1/27 ultra-rare Secret Figure complete the premium collecting experience.
Official licensed product with deluxe packaging and guaranteed authenticity.

settings.heading: Ready for Battle: Dynamic Poses and Epic Action
settings.text: With multiple points of articulation, these figures are ready for any galactic showdown.

settings.title: Ultraman vs Monsters: The Battle is About to Begin!
settings.sub_title: Awesome Building, Instant Action, Build Awesome Figures, Summon Heroes in a Snap
settings.left_richtext_unit1:
• Two-color head: solid and clear ABS plastic for lifelike, see-through eyes
  • Solid ABS plastic chest armor with metallic accents and painted details
  • ABS plastic shoulder pads shaped like the real thing, with painted patterns
settings.right_richtext_unit1:
• Upper arms with bumps to attach shoulder pads
  • C-shaped hands to hold weapons and tools
settings.richtext_unit2:
• Bendable arms and legs with two joints for action poses
  • One-piece lower arms and legs made of ABS and POM plastic, easy to attach
settings.left_richtext_unit3:
• Innovative "jumpsuit collar" design concept
  • Separable lower jaw component
settings.right_richtext_unit3:
• Uniquely shaped arms and legs
  • Individual modular design for claws and appendages

settings.richtext_unit2:
• Dual-injection molded head (solid and clear ABS) for realistic, translucent eyes
  • Solid ABS shoulder armor, faithfully replicating each Ultraman's unique look with detailed paint and printing

settings.left_richtext_unit1:
• Studded upper arms provide a stable fit for shoulder armor.
  • C-shaped hands are designed for firm gripping of hand-held weapons.
  • Double-jointed limbs for a wide range of action poses.
settings.right_richtext_unit1:
• Dual-injection molded ABS and POM lower arms/legs with one-way assembly.
  • Detachable and poseable accessories with secure arm mounting.

settings.title: Ultraman vs. Monsters: Epic Showdown!
settings.sub_title: Build the action, summon the heroes!

settings.block_text: Experience the thrill of the unknown! Each box contains one mystery Ultraman character from Ultraman Galaxy Fight 3: The Destined Crossroads waiting to be discovered. Who will you find? The perfect gift for any occasion!
The ~21-piece construction offers a satisfying building experience without being overly complex, suitable for fans of all ages 9+.
With 14 points of articulation, your Ultraman figures are highly poseable. Recreate their iconic fighting stances and bring the action to life!
Equip your Ultraman figures with iconic weapons like Belial Twilight, Orb Caliber, Spreader Spear, - Mebius Blade, and Ultraman Ribut. These accessories add extra detail and play value.
Figures feature detailed sculpts and paint applications, capturing the unique look of each hero and villain. Note: While the eyes utilize translucent plastic for a realistic effect.
Made from high-quality ABS and POM plastics, these figures are designed for durability and can handle exciting battles.
This is a genuine, officially licensed product, ensuring quality and authenticity for collectors.
Show off your built figures with the included display stand. Perfect for collectors!

settings.heading: For the Ultimate Fan: A Must-Have Collection
settings.text: Celebrate your love of Ultraman with these highly detailed and collectible figures.

settings.content_text: Really solid build quality. Colors are bright, joints are strong, and the stands work great. Each figure takes about 10 minutes to build. Only wish I knew which one I was getting before buying.

These are amazing! Each figure has 14 moving parts and comes with its own stand. The weapons actually stay in their hands (finally!). Perfect size for my collection shelf. Hope I get that rare secret figure next time!
Bought this for my son's birthday. He loves building them and making battle scenes. The quality is great - nothing breaks or falls apart during play. The surprise box makes it extra exciting!

Got my first box today - so happy! The pieces snap together easily and the figure can move in so many ways. The weapons look awesome and the clear plastic parts make it look just like the TV show. My desk has a new guardian!
Love how each character looks exactly like in the show. The clear parts for the eyes look so cool! All the joints move smoothly, and you can pose them any way you want. Already ordered more!
These are addictive! The build is simple but fun, and the figures look amazing on display. Got lucky and found the rare secret figure - it's real! Can't wait to complete my collection.
Just the right size for my desk at work. Love how sturdy they feel - no loose parts or wobbly joints. The weapons look great and the standing poses are super stable. Definitely getting more!

settings.title: Dynamic Action & Posing, Recreate Epic Battle Scenes!
settings.sub_title: Build and pose your favorite Ultraman heroes in dynamic action sequences.

settings.heading: The Destined Crossroad: Ultra Warriors Unite
settings.context: At the crossroads of light, heroes gather for battle

settings.block_title: Which Ultraman characters are in this set?
settings.block_text: This set features Ultraman Zett Delta Rise Claw, Cosmos (Luna and Corona Modes), Mebius, Orb Origin, Ribut, Regulos, Absolute Diavolo, Zetton, and a secret rare chase figure, Ultraman Cosmos Phantom.

settings.block_title: What are my odds of getting the secret rare chase figure?
settings.block_text: The secret rare chase figure (Ultraman Cosmos Phantom) has a pull rate of 1/27, meaning there's approximately a 1 in 27 chance of finding it in a Surprise box.

settings.block_title: What exactly comes inside each surprise box?
settings.block_text: Each box contains one assembled Ultraman figure, a character-specific weapon accessory or poseable hand gesture, a display stand for the figure, and an instruction manual.

settings.block_title: What materials are the figures made of, and do they light up?
settings.block_text: The figures are constructed from durable, high-quality ABS and POM plastic. They feature detailed paint applications and some translucent parts for visual effects.

settings.block_title: How poseable are these figures, and can I recreate action scenes?
settings.block_text: Yes! Each figure boasts 14 points of articulation, allowing for a wide range of dynamic poses and the ability to recreate iconic battle scenes.

settings.block_title: Are these figures officially licensed Ultraman merchandise?
settings.block_text: Yes, these are officially licensed Ultraman products, guaranteeing authenticity and quality.

settings.block_title: What is the age recommendation and safety information for this product?
settings.block_text: These figures are recommended for ages 9 and up. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Small parts. Not for children under 3 years. Adult supervision is recommended for younger children.

settings.block_title: When will single Ultraman figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!

settings.block_title: When will single Ultraman figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
